title: Mayor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may Reveal yourself as the Mayor of the Town during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot reveal on Day 1.
- You can not reveal if you are on trial.
- When Revealed, your vote counts as 3.
- When Revealed, your Defense cannot be raised above None.
